exercise-tasks.description: Count the number of countries in each region, showing the region name and country count.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Region, COUNT() FROM Countries
GROUP BY Region
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Region, COUNT() FROM Countries GROUP BY Region

exercise-tasks.description: Calculate the total population for each region, showing the region name and population count.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Region, SUM(Population) FROM Countries
GROUP BY Region
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Region, SUM(Population) FROM Countries GROUP BY Region

exercise-tasks.description: Find regions where the total population exceeds 100 million, showing the region name and population count.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Region, SUM(Population) FROM Countries
GROUP BY Region
HAVING SUM(Population) > 100000000
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Region, SUM(Population) FROM Countries GROUP BY Region HAVING SUM(Population) > 100000000

exercise-tasks.description: List regions with more than 2 countries, showing the region name and number of countries.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Region, COUNT() FROM Countries
GROUP BY Region
HAVING COUNT() > 2
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Region, COUNT() FROM Countries GROUP BY Region HAVING COUNT() > 2
